summary: Realistic Adjustments and 12 x Sword damage.
descriptionHtml:
* I am taking requests on how this Perk works. Just let me know in as much detail as possible how you would like the mod to work*

Compatibility: This mod only modifies the Assassin\'s Blade perk. Load order doesn\'t matter as long a you place it after any other mod which modifies this perk.

Update: 
UNAWARE 1.4 and UNAWARE 12xSwords 1.3 Update
- Just a little tweak. Now when sneaking in the line of sight of unaware targets you also have 5% chance of getting 15x multiplier if not being invisible. This chance was missing in previous version (invisible or forced 6x). I\'ve rewritten UNAWARE mod description for the shake of clarity.


--------------------------------------------


Description - 12 x Sword Multiplier 1.0
This mod Adds to the Assassin\'s Blade perk by Adding a 12 x Sword damage multiplier. So people who love using swords while being sneaky can do so and get the same benefits as using daggers. 

Reasoning Behind the 12 x Multiplier:

------Item---------------Damage(base)------Multiplier---------Total Damage
Daedric Dagger------------18---------------------15-------------------270
Daedric Sword-------------23---------------------12-------------------276

Ebony Dagger--------------11---------------------15-------------------165
Ebony Sword---------------14---------------------12-------------------168

And so on.



Description - UNAWARE 1.4
Perk affects daggers only, as in vanilla. How the perk works:
- Target is unaware (not in combat/searching for the player/alerted somehow) and player performs a sneak attack from behind/flank (out of the target\'s cone of vision): 15x damage multiplier is applied.
- Target is unaware and player performs a frontal sneak attack (or player is within the target\'s cone of vision): 15x damage multiplier is applied IF player is invisible, otherwise player has 5% chance of getting a 15x hit, 95% chance of getting a 6x hit.
- Target is NOT unaware and player performs a sneak attack (from any relative position): player has 5% chance of getting a 15x hit, 95% chance of getting a 6x hit. Whether player is invisible doesn\'t matter, so abusing Shadow Warrior is limited to 6x hits 95% of time.



Description - 12 x Sword Multiplier UNAWARE 1.3
A combination of Unaware 1.4 and 12xSword Multiplier 1.0. For those who want 15x/12x multiplier for daggers/swords with UNAWARE adjustments.




--------------------------------------------



Changes:
12-APR-12: Added missing 5% chance of 15x/12x damage multiplier with daggers/swords when sneaking in the line of sight of unaware targets and player is not invisible.

8-APR-12: UNAWARE and UNAWARE 12x Swords allow for a 5% chance of getting 15x/12x damage multiplier with daggers/swords when targets are alerted/in combat.

24-MAR-12: Invisibility Now works properly with line of sitght on UNAWARE and UNAWARE 12x Swords. Thanks again to Reducer for the conditions 

23-MAR-12: UNAWARE 1.1 Update - You will now only get the 15x Multiplier if you are behind/flanking your enemy. If they turn around on you but have not detected you it will only give you a 6x multiplier. You can not be in their line of sight. 

21-MAR-12: Added another Adjustment to the Assassins Blade Perk. This one is for people who prefer to only use Daggers on back stab and the 15 Multiplier only work on Targets that are 100% unaware. So if the target is ready for combat(weapons out and ready to rumble) or are alarmed. Then you will only get the 6x Multiplier. Thanks to Reducer for the Idea. 


---------------------------------------------
